CustomField.formula: IF((ISPICKVAL( Job_Category__c , 'Sales') || ISPICKVAL( Job_Category__c , 'Sales Support')), If( No_Ratings_Complete__c = 7, "Yes", IF(No_Ratings_Complete__c = 0,"Not Started", "No")), If( No_Ratings_Complete__c = 6, "Yes", IF(No_Ratings_Complete__c = 0,"Not Started", "No")))
CustomField.label: All Ratings Complete
